Sentencas: Y and Fe co-doped SrTiO3 powder with a phase-pure perovskite structure were synthesized by solid state reaction (SSR) and the Pechini method.
Titulo: Catalytic Activity of Y and Fe Co-Doped SrTio3 Perovskites for Methane Oxidation

Sentencas: The catalytic activity of Y0.08Sr0.92FexTi1-xO3-delta (x = 0.1, 0.2, 0.3, and 0.4) for the methane oxidation reaction was evaluated in terms of the iron content in the perovskite lattice.
Titulo: Catalytic Activity of Y and Fe Co-Doped SrTio3 Perovskites for Methane Oxidation

Sentencas: When the CH4/O-2 ratio was 0.25, the total oxidation of methane was predominant.
Titulo: Catalytic Activity of Y and Fe Co-Doped SrTio3 Perovskites for Methane Oxidation

Sentencas: Methane oxidation started at 450 degrees C and increased with increasing temperature.
Titulo: Catalytic Activity of Y and Fe Co-Doped SrTio3 Perovskites for Methane Oxidation

Sentencas: The methane conversion rate strongly depended on the iron content.
Titulo: Catalytic Activity of Y and Fe Co-Doped SrTio3 Perovskites for Methane Oxidation

Sentencas: With higher iron content, the methane conversion rate was accordingly enhanced.
Titulo: Catalytic Activity of Y and Fe Co-Doped SrTio3 Perovskites for Methane Oxidation

Sentencas: This phenomenon may be attributed to the presence of oxygen vacancies in the perovskite lattice.
Titulo: Catalytic Activity of Y and Fe Co-Doped SrTio3 Perovskites for Methane Oxidation

Sentencas: At a CH4/O-2 ratio=2, a partial oxidation reaction occurred at temperature above 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Catalytic Activity of Y and Fe Co-Doped SrTio3 Perovskites for Methane Oxidation
